languages.text: For 1 round the Warrior gains +<u>(5 + 2 × TGH bonus)</u>% additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against attacks made by targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the Warrior's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.
languages.original_text: На 1 раунд воин получает +<u>(5 + 2 × бонус ВЫН)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g} дополнительно при атаках врагов, которых он {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}поразил{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}одиночными{/g} выстрелами или атаками в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}.

traits.locale_text: For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. the Fighter gains +<u>(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against attacks made by targets hit by the Fighter's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single-shot{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

For 1 round the Warrior gains +<u>(5 + 2 × TGH bonus)</u>% additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against attacks made by targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the Warrior's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

For 1 round the Warrior gains +<u>(5 + 2 × TGH bonus)</u>% additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against attacks made by targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the Warrior's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

languages.text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}被{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}单发射击{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}时，战士在此次攻击中{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}提高<u>（5+2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%，此效果持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} gains +<u>(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against attacks made by targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the Warrior's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当战士受到{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}单发射击{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}时，战士在此次攻击中{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}提高<u>（5+2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%，此效果持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: Durante 1 asalto, el guerrero gana un +<u>(5 + 2 × bonificación por RES)</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} adicional contra los ataques de los objetivos {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactados{/g} por sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} o de {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}un solo disparo{/g}.
languages.original_text: For 1 round the Warrior gains +<u>(5 + 2 × TGH bonus)</u>% additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against attacks made by targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the Warrior's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, el guerrero gana un +<u>(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g})</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} adicional contra los ataques de los objetivos {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactados{/g} por sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} o de {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}un solo disparo{/g}.

languages.text: 1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間有効。{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}単発射撃{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}受けた{/g}ターゲットが行う攻撃に対し、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}に<u>(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>%が追加される。

languages.original_text: For 1 round the Warrior gains +<u>(5 + 2 × TGH bonus)</u>% additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against attacks made by targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the Warrior's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: На 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} боец получает +<u>(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ВЫН{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g} дополнительно при атаках врагов, которых он поразил {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}одиночными выстрелами{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}атаками в ближнем бою{/g}.

languages.text: Für 1 Runde erlangt der Krieger +<u>(5 + 2 × ZÄH-Bonus)</u> % zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} gegen Angriffe von Zielen, die vom {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Einzelschuss{/g} oder den {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffen{/g} des Kriegers {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffen{/g} wurden.
languages.original_text: For 1 round the Warrior gains +<u>(5 + 2 × TGH bonus)</u>% additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against attacks made by targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the Warrior's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} erlangt der Krieger +<u>(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ZÄH{/g}- {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> % zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} gegen Angriffe von Zielen, die vom {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Einzelschuss{/g} oder den {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffen{/g} des Kriegers {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffen{/g} wurden.

languages.text: Pendant 1 round, le guerrier bénéficie de +<u>(5 + 2 × bonus d'END)</u> % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} supplémentaire contre les attaques que mènent des cibles {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchées{/g} par une attaque {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}au coup par coup{/g} ou une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} de ce guerrier.
languages.original_text: For 1 round the Warrior gains +<u>(5 + 2 × TGH bonus)</u>% additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against attacks made by targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the Warrior's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, le Combattant bénéficie de +<u>(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g})</u> % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} supplémentaire contre les attaques que mènent des cibles touchées par une attaque {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}au coup par coup{/g} ou une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} de ce Combattant.

Pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Guerrier{/g} bénéficie de +<u>(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}END{/g})</u> % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} supplémentaire contre les attaques que mènent des cibles {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchées{/g} par une {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}attaque au coup par coup{/g} ou une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} de ce Guerrier.
